item.title: Creating your own Static Website
item.description: Introduction Creating and hosting a website is something that many of us wondered if not tried to do. While hosting a dynamic website is comparatively challenging, its quite easy to host a simple static website with something like Github Pages. So in this post I try to help people setup up what could potentially be your first website :D Note: Being a developer I just assume that people know the basics of computer programming and can get by with using a little bit of commandline.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Keivan Shah. A curious engineer trying to make his living working as a Software Developer! Thanks for stopping by my website! Currently I am not sure what I intend to do with this website but hopefully I will figure it out someday :D
